Bash(/tmp/debug_assets.exp << 'EOF'
#!/usr/bin/expect -f

set timeout 60
spawn ssh officeftp@165.22.118.253
expect {
    "password:" {
        send "pEN%#nvlC\\$sESeBjcfGt2v\\$8\\r"
        expect {
            "$ " {
                send "cd /home/1197962.cloudwaysapps.com/hczbsjjmgr/public_html\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "ls -lh public/build/\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "cat public/build/manifest.json | head -50\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "ls -lh public/build/assets/ | head -20\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "cat resources/views/app.blade.php\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "php artisan config:clear\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "php artisan cache:clear\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "php artisan view:clear\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "exit\\r"
            }
            "# " {
                send "cd /home/1197962.cloudwaysapps.com/hczbsjjmgr/public_html\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "ls -lh public/build/\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "cat public/build/manifest.json | head -50\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "ls -lh public/build/assets/ | head -20\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "cat resources/views/app.blade.php\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "php artisan config:clear\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "php artisan cache:clear\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "php artisan view:clear\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "exit\\r"
            }
        }
    }
    timeout {
        puts "Connection timeout"
        exit 1
    }
}
EOF)

Bash(/tmp/fix_env_and_routes.exp << 'EOF'
#!/usr/bin/expect -f

set timeout 60
spawn ssh officeftp@165.22.118.253
expect {
    "password:" {
        send "pEN%#nvlC\\$sESeBjcfGt2v\\$8\\r"
        expect {
            "$ " {
                send "cd /home/1197962.cloudwaysapps.com/hczbsjjmgr/public_html\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "cp .env .env.backup.$\(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S\)\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "sed -i 's/APP_ENV=local/APP_ENV=production/' .env\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "sed -i 's/APP_DEBUG=true/APP_DEBUG=false/' .env\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "grep -E 'APP_ENV|APP_DEBUG' .env\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "cp routes/web.php routes/web.php.backup.$\(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S\)\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "cat > routes/web.php << 'WEBEOF'\\r"
                send "<?php\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "use App\\\\\\\\Http\\\\\\\\Controllers\\\\\\\\WorkRequest\\\\\\\\DigitalMediaOptionsController;\\r"
                send "use App\\\\\\\\Http\\\\\\\\Controllers\\\\\\\\WorkRequest\\\\\\\\WorkFormController;\\r"
                send "use App\\\\\\\\Http\\\\\\\\Controllers\\\\\\\\WorkRequest\\\\\\\\WorkRequestEntryController;\\r"
                send "use Illuminate\\\\\\\\Support\\\\\\\\Facades\\\\\\\\Route;\\r"
                send "use Inertia\\\\\\\\Inertia;\\r"
                send "use Laravel\\\\\\\\Fortify\\\\\\\\Features;\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "Route::get\('/', function \(\) {\\r"
                send "    if \(auth\(\)->check\(\)\) {\\r"
                send "        return redirect\(\)->route\('dashboard'\);\\r"
                send "    }\\r"
                send "    return redirect\(\)->route\('login'\);\\r"
                send "}\)->name\('home'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "Route::get\('/welcome', function \(\) {\\r"
                send "    return Inertia::render\('welcome', [\\r"
                send "        'canRegister' => Features::enabled\(Features::registration\(\)\),\\r"
                send "    ]\);\\r"
                send "}\)->name\('welcome'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "Route::prefix\('forms'\)->name\('forms.'\)->group\(function \(\) {\\r"
                send "    Route::get\('/', [WorkFormController::class, 'publicIndex']\)->name\('index'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::get\('easter-holidays', function \(\) {\\r"
                send "        return Inertia::render\('forms/easter-holidays'\);\\r"
                send "    }\)->name\('easter-holidays'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::get\('christmas-holidays', function \(\) {\\r"
                send "        return Inertia::render\('forms/christmas-holidays'\);\\r"
                send "    }\)->name\('christmas-holidays'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::post\('easter-holidays/entries', [WorkRequestEntryController::class, 'storePublicEasterHolidayEntry']\)\\r"
                send "        ->name\('easter-holidays.entries.store'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::post\('christmas-holidays/entries', [WorkRequestEntryController::class, 'storePublicChristmasHolidayEntry']\)\\r"
                send "        ->name\('christmas-holidays.entries.store'\);\\r"
                send "}\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "Route::get\('work-request', function \(\) {\\r"
                send "    return Inertia::render\('work-request-tabs'\);\\r"
                send "}\)->name\('work-request'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "Route::post\('work-request/entries', [WorkRequestEntryController::class, 'storePublicWorkRequestEntry']\)\\r"
                send "    ->name\('work-request.entries.store'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "Route::get\('work-request/digital-media-options', DigitalMediaOptionsController::class\)\\r"
                send "    ->name\('work-request.digital-media-options'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "Route::middleware\(['auth', 'verified']\)->group\(function \(\) {\\r"
                send "    Route::get\('dashboard', function \(\) {\\r"
                send "        return Inertia::render\('dashboard'\);\\r"
                send "    }\)->name\('dashboard'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::get\('work-request/entries', [WorkRequestEntryController::class, 'index']\)\\r"
                send "        ->name\('work-request.entries.index'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::get\('work-request/entries/{entry}', [WorkRequestEntryController::class, 'show']\)\\r"
                send "        ->name\('work-request.entries.show'\);\\r"
                send "}\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "Route::middleware\(['auth', 'verified', 'workforms.admin']\)->group\(function \(\) {\\r"
                send "    Route::get\('admin/forms', [WorkFormController::class, 'adminIndex']\)\\r"
                send "        ->name\('admin.forms.index'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::get\('admin/forms/entries', [WorkRequestEntryController::class, 'adminFormsEntriesIndex']\)\\r"
                send "        ->name\('admin.forms.entries.index'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::get\('admin/forms/entries/{formSlug}', [WorkRequestEntryController::class, 'adminFormEntries']\)\\r"
                send "        ->where\('formSlug', '[A-Za-z0-9\\\\\\\\-]+'\)\\r"
                send "        ->name\('admin.forms.entries.show'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::get\('admin/forms/entries/{formSlug}/{entry}', [WorkRequestEntryController::class, 'adminFormEntryShow']\)\\r"
                send "        ->where\('formSlug', '[A-Za-z0-9\\\\\\\\-]+'\)\\r"
                send "        ->name\('admin.forms.entries.entry.show'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::get\('admin/forms/entries/{formSlug}/{entry}/edit', [WorkRequestEntryController::class, 'adminFormEntryEdit']\)\\r"
                send "        ->where\('formSlug', '[A-Za-z0-9\\\\\\\\-]+'\)\\r"
                send "        ->name\('admin.forms.entries.entry.edit'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::put\('admin/forms/entries/{formSlug}/{entry}', [WorkRequestEntryController::class, 'adminFormEntryUpdate']\)\\r"
                send "        ->where\('formSlug', '[A-Za-z0-9\\\\\\\\-]+'\)\\r"
                send "        ->name\('admin.forms.entries.entry.update'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::delete\('admin/forms/entries/{formSlug}/{entry}', [WorkRequestEntryController::class, 'adminFormEntryDestroy']\)\\r"
                send "        ->where\('formSlug', '[A-Za-z0-9\\\\\\\\-]+'\)\\r"
                send "        ->name\('admin.forms.entries.entry.destroy'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::get\('admin/forms/{formSlug}', [WorkFormController::class, 'adminShow']\)\\r"
                send "        ->where\('formSlug', '[A-Za-z0-9\\\\\\\\-]+'\)\\r"
                send "        ->name\('admin.forms.show'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::get\('admin/forms/{formSlug}/edit', [WorkFormController::class, 'adminEdit']\)\\r"
                send "        ->where\('formSlug', '[A-Za-z0-9\\\\\\\\-]+'\)\\r"
                send "        ->name\('admin.forms.edit'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::put\('admin/forms/{formSlug}', [WorkFormController::class, 'adminUpdate']\)\\r"
                send "        ->where\('formSlug', '[A-Za-z0-9\\\\\\\\-]+'\)\\r"
                send "        ->name\('admin.forms.update'\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "    Route::delete\('admin/forms/{formSlug}', [WorkFormController::class, 'adminDestroy']\)\\r"
                send "        ->where\('formSlug', '[A-Za-z0-9\\\\\\\\-]+'\)\\r"
                send "        ->name\('admin.forms.destroy'\);\\r"
                send "}\);\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "require __DIR__.'/settings.php';\\r"
                send "WEBEOF\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "php artisan config:clear\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "php artisan route:clear\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "php artisan view:clear\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "echo 'Environment and routes updated'\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "exit\\r"
            }
            "# " {
                send "cd /home/1197962.cloudwaysapps.com/hczbsjjmgr/public_html\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "cp .env .env.backup.$\(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S\)\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "sed -i 's/APP_ENV=local/APP_ENV=production/' .env\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "sed -i 's/APP_DEBUG=true/APP_DEBUG=false/' .env\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "grep -E 'APP_ENV|APP_DEBUG' .env\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "php artisan config:clear\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "php artisan route:clear\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "php artisan view:clear\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "echo 'Environment updated'\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "exit\\r"
            }
        }
    }
    timeout {
        puts "Connection timeout"
        exit 1
    }
}
EOF)

Bash(/tmp/create_auth_controllers.exp << 'EOF'
#!/usr/bin/expect -f

set timeout 120
spawn ssh officeftp@165.22.118.253
expect {
    "password:" {
        send "pEN%#nvlC\\$sESeBjcfGt2v\\$8\\r"
        expect {
            "$ " {
                send "cd /home/1197962.cloudwaysapps.com/hczbsjjmgr/public_html\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "mkdir -p resources/js/actions/Laravel/Fortify\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "cat > resources/js/actions/Laravel/Fortify/LoginController.ts << 'LOGINEOF'\\r"
                send "export const store = {\\r"
                send "    form: \(\) => \({\\r"
                send "        method: 'post',\\r"
                send "        url: '/login'\\r"
                send "    }\)\\r"
                send "};\\r"
                send "LOGINEOF\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "cat > resources/js/actions/Laravel/Fortify/RegisterController.ts << 'REGEOF'\\r"
                send "export const store = {\\r"
                send "    form: \(\) => \({\\r"
                send "        method: 'post',\\r"
                send "        url: '/register'\\r"
                send "    }\)\\r"
                send "};\\r"
                send "REGEOF\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "cat > resources/js/actions/Laravel/Fortify/PasswordController.ts << 'PASSEOF'\\r"
                send "export const email = {\\r"
                send "    form: \(\) => \({\\r"
                send "        method: 'post',\\r"
                send "        url: '/forgot-password'\\r"
                send "    }\)\\r"
                send "};\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "export const update = {\\r"
                send "    form: \(\) => \({\\r"
                send "        method: 'post',\\r"
                send "        url: '/reset-password'\\r"
                send "    }\)\\r"
                send "};\\r"
                send "PASSEOF\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "cat > resources/js/actions/Laravel/Fortify/PasswordConfirmationController.ts << 'CONFEOF'\\r"
                send "export const store = {\\r"
                send "    form: \(\) => \({\\r"
                send "        method: 'post',\\r"
                send "        url: '/user/confirm-password'\\r"
                send "    }\)\\r"
                send "};\\r"
                send "CONFEOF\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "cat > resources/js/actions/Laravel/Fortify/EmailVerificationController.ts << 'VEREOF'\\r"
                send "export const send = {\\r"
                send "    form: \(\) => \({\\r"
                send "        method: 'post',\\r"
                send "        url: '/email/verification-notification'\\r"
                send "    }\)\\r"
                send "};\\r"
                send "VEREOF\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "cat > resources/js/actions/Laravel/Fortify/TwoFactorAuthenticationController.ts << 'TWOEOF'\\r"
                send "export const enable = {\\r"
                send "    form: \(\) => \({\\r"
                send "        method: 'post',\\r"
                send "        url: '/user/two-factor-authentication'\\r"
                send "    }\)\\r"
                send "};\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "export const disable = {\\r"
                send "    form: \(\) => \({\\r"
                send "        method: 'delete',\\r"
                send "        url: '/user/two-factor-authentication'\\r"
                send "    }\)\\r"
                send "};\\r"
                send "\\r"
                send "export const store = {\\r"
                send "    form: \(\) => \({\\r"
                send "        method: 'post',\\r"
                send "        url: '/two-factor-challenge'\\r"
                send "    }\)\\r"
                send "};\\r"
                send "TWOEOF\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "echo 'Controllers created'\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "ls -la resources/js/actions/Laravel/Fortify/\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "exit\\r"
            }
            "# " {
                send "cd /home/1197962.cloudwaysapps.com/hczbsjjmgr/public_html\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "mkdir -p resources/js/actions/Laravel/Fortify\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "exit\\r"
            }
        }
    }
    timeout {
        puts "Connection timeout"
        exit 1
    }
}
EOF)

            "$ " {
                send "cd /home/1197962.cloudwaysapps.com/hczbsjjmgr/public_html\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "ls -la resources/js/actions/Laravel/Fortify/\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "cat resources/js/pages/auth/login.tsx | head -20\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "sed -i \\"s|import { store } from '@/routes/login';|import { store } from '@/actions/Laravel/Fortify/LoginController';|\\" resources/js/pages/auth/login.tsx\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "sed -i \\"s|import { store } from '@/routes/register';|import { store } from '@/actions/Laravel/Fortify/RegisterController';|\\" resources/js/pages/auth/register.tsx\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "sed -i \\"s|import { request, email } from '@/routes/password';|import { email } from '@/actions/Laravel/Fortify/PasswordController';|\\" resources/js/pages/auth/forgot-password.tsx\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "sed -i \\"s|import { update } from '@/routes/password';|import { update } from '@/actions/Laravel/Fortify/PasswordController';|\\" resources/js/pages/auth/reset-password.tsx\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "sed -i \\"s|import { store } from '@/routes/password/confirm';|import { store } from '@/actions/Laravel/Fortify/PasswordConfirmationController';|\\" resources/js/pages/auth/confirm-password.tsx\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "sed -i \\"s|import { send } from '@/routes/verification';|import { send } from '@/actions/Laravel/Fortify/EmailVerificationController';|\\" resources/js/pages/auth/verify-email.tsx\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "sed -i \\"s|import { store } from '@/routes/two-factor/login';|import { store } from '@/actions/Laravel/Fortify/TwoFactorAuthenticationController';|\\" resources/js/pages/auth/two-factor-challenge.tsx\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "sed -i \\"s|import { enable, disable } from '@/routes/two-factor';|import { enable, disable } from '@/actions/Laravel/Fortify/TwoFactorAuthenticationController';|\\" resources/js/pages/settings/two-factor.tsx\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "echo 'Auth page imports updated'\\r"
                expect "$ "
                send "./node_modules/.bin/vite build\\r"
                expect {
                    "$ " {
                        send "echo 'BUILD_EXIT_CODE: '\\\\$?\\r"
                        expect "$ "
                        send "ls -lh public/build/manifest.json\\r"
                        expect "$ "
                        send "exit\\r"
                    }
                    timeout {
                        send "echo 'Build timeout'\\r"
                        expect "$ "
                        send "exit\\r"
                    }
                }
            }
            "# " {
                send "cd /home/1197962.cloudwaysapps.com/hczbsjjmgr/public_html\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "ls -la resources/js/actions/Laravel/Fortify/\\r"
                expect "# "
                send "exit\\r"
            }
        }
    }
    timeout {
        puts "Connection timeout"
        exit 1
    }
}
EOF)
